      • setChannels

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Boolean> setChannels​(java.util.Set<com.mentalab.utils.ConfigSwitch> switches)
                                                           throws com.mentalab.exception.InvalidCommandException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException,
                                                                  com.mentalab.exception.NoBluetoothException
        Enables or disables data collection of a channel. Sending a mix of enable and disable switches does not work. \\todo: CHECK FOR THIS

        By default data from all channels is collected. Disable channels you do not need to save bandwidth and power.

        Parameters:
        switches - List of channels to set on (true) or off (false) channel0 ... channel7
        Throws:
        com.mentalab.exception.InvalidCommandException - If the provided Switches are not all type Channel.
        java.io.IOException
        com.mentalab.exception.NoBluetoothException

      • setModule

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Boolean> setModule​(com.mentalab.utils.ConfigSwitch mSwitch)
                                                         throws com.mentalab.exception.InvalidCommandException,
                                                                java.io.IOException,
                                                                com.mentalab.exception.NoBluetoothException
        Enables or disables data collection of a module.

        By default data from all modules is collected. Disable modules you do not need to save bandwidth and power.

        Throws:
        com.mentalab.exception.InvalidCommandException
        java.io.IOException
        com.mentalab.exception.NoBluetoothException

      • setSamplingRate

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> setSamplingRate​(com.mentalab.utils.constants.SamplingRate sr)
                                                                          throws com.mentalab.exception.InvalidCommandException,
                                                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                                                 com.mentalab.exception.NoBluetoothException
        Sets sampling rate of the device

        Sampling rate only applies to ExG data. Orientation and Environment data are always sampled at 20Hz.

        Throws:
        com.mentalab.exception.InvalidCommandException
        java.io.IOException
        com.mentalab.exception.NoBluetoothException
